import axios from"axios";var BASE_URL="http://localhost:8080/Bank-Widgets/client/src/utils";var API={getRate:function getRate(){return axios({method:"GET",url:BASE_URL+"/API/getRate.php"});},getPrice:function getPrice(data){return axios({method:"POST",url:BASE_URL+"/API/getPrice.php",data:data});}// need to set up a post call that will pass the following parameters to the url: homePrice, downPayment, and interestRate
};export default API;
